definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Great-Sage Sun/Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1]
Great Sage the Equal of Heaven, self-proclaimed title of the Monkey King Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1] in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]

sentences.english: Thus the Great Sage was caught.
Besides, ideas on the development of Monkey King culture and the cultural industry in Shunchang are put forward hereafter.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上，對大聖文化與順昌文化產業提出了思考。

sentences.english: He is Sun Wukong, the Great Sage Equaling Heaven, who made havoc in Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 就是那大鬧天宮的齊天大聖孫悟空。

sentences.english: The Daishonin was fiercely attacked by people throughout Japan.
sentences.chinese: 大聖人曾遭受日本全國猛烈的反彈攻擊。

sentences.english: A gilded Monkey enshrined in his "Great Sage" temple.
sentences.chinese: 大聖廟壇中的老孫金身。

sentences.english: Wu-k'ung dived into a brook and changed into a fish.
sentences.chinese: 那大聖又將身按下，鑽進溪流裏變作一條魚兒。

sentences.english: This place contains one of the greatest of the twenty-five sacred places in Khampa areas.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有康巴藏區二十五大聖地之王的章龍貝瑪喜布。

definition: founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
Wuji county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊地區|石家庄地区[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 di4 qu1], Hebei/The Promise (name of film by Chen Kaige)
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
outstanding people/water and fire (in Daoist writing)
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
rotating disk/wheel/rotor/cycle of reincarnation in Buddhism
